trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration element that specifies transaction flow support for a binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TransactionFlowElement"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether wildcard action is permitted.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if wildcard action is permitted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Applies the content of this binding configuration section to the specified transaction flow binding element.
This method is called internally by the infrastructure when translating the configuration elements into binding settings.
A binding element of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref>.
bindingElement is .
bindingElement is not of type .
Gets the <xref:System.Type> object that represents the type of this configuration element.
The type of this configuration element.
Copies the content of the specified configuration section to this configuration section.
The configuration section to be copied.
from is .
The configuration file is read-only.

Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref> object that has enabled transaction flow and uses the same <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> as the current element.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref> object that has enabled transaction flow, and uses the same <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> as the current element
Initializes this binding configuration section with the content of the specified binding element.
A binding element of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref>.
bindingElement is .
bindingElement is not of type .

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
Gets or sets the transaction protocol to be used.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> that specifies the transaction protocol to be used for transaction flow.
The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions*>.
